marklogic.body: So this administration puts out a travel warning, saying copllege student shoudl avoid Mexico over Spring Break becasue it is dangerous. And then he sends his daughter there for Srping Break, with 25 Secret Service agents to protect her. And there are PLENTY of bvacation Spots in AMERICA that she could have gone and at least helped OUR economy a little with the visit. Obama is an IDIOT for putting his daughter in harms way in a foreign country and then sticking ME with the bill for her protection.
